title: Hunga Tonga-Hunga Ha’apai, Tonga
description: Hunga Tonga-Hunga Haʻapai is a volcano located about 30 kilometres (19 miles) south-southeast of Fonuafoʻou (also known as Falcon Island), an island which is part of the nation of Tonga.
theme:
WATER. Something special that holds
all life together
